name: ContractContactRole
description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on a Contract.
summary: The {ContractContactRole} object in Salesforce is used to track the role of a contact associated with a contract. It allows users to specify the role of a contact, such as decision maker, influencer, or signer, in relation to a specific contract. This information can help sales teams better understand the relationships between contacts and contracts, and improve communication and decision-making processes.
label: Contract Contact Role
